name: Backlog Grooming
description: Ingest raw requirements or groom the existing backlog — decompose oversized items, write acceptance criteria, assign sizes, and establish priority order

ingestion.description: Take raw requirements and decompose them into properly-sized, prioritized backlog items — write all new items to backlog.json

review.description: Review the updated backlog for health — check sizing, acceptance criteria completeness, dependencies, and priority order

done.description: Grooming complete — summarize the backlog state and note what is ready for sprint planning
